城市中每个区域+3 [ICON_Gold] 金币。城市中每个改良设施+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
This city receives +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each District, and receives +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each improved tile.

Commercial Hub and Harbor Districts receive +150% adjacency bonuses in the city.

This city receives +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each unimproved feature. Tiles adjacent to unimproved features receive +1 Appeal in this city.
城市中每位 [ICON_Citizen] 公民每回合可带来4 [ICON_Gold] 金币的收入。
+4 [ICON_Gold] Gold per turn for each [ICON_Citizen] Citizen in the city.

城市中每有一座商业中心建筑和港口建筑， [ICON_Gold] 金币产出便+10%。
+10% to [ICON_Gold] Gold for each Commercial building and Harbor building in the city.
城市防御+5 [ICON_STRENGTH] 战斗力，您在9个单元格内的其他城市每回合获得对您文明的4点忠诚度。就职需要3回合。
Increase City Defence [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength by 5. Your other cities within 9 tiles gain +4 Loyalty per turn towards your civilization. Establishes in 3 turns.
就职城市无法被围攻。城市领土内的单位防御时可+5 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
City cannot be put under siege. Units defending within the city's territory get +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

生产单位所需战略资源花费减少60%。本城正确改良的战略每回合积累+1。
Strategic resource costs for units are discounted 60%. Accumulating Strategic resources in the city gain an additional +1 per turn.
城市每回合获得一次额外的 [ICON_Ranged] 远程攻击机会。本城生产的军事工程师次数+2，且生产军事工程师时+100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。

City gains an additional [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strike per turn. Millitary Engineer trained in this city receive extra 2 charges. +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Millitary Engineer in this city.

Conscription
此城中生产的所有军事单位若初始未拥有免费升级，则其初始可获得一项免费升级。本城训练的所有军事单位获得永久+3 [ICON_STRENGTH] 战斗力和+25%战斗经验值。

Military units trained in this city start with a free promotion that do not already start with a free promotion. All millitary units trained in this city receive extra +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength and +25% Combat Experience permanently.
在城市中进行核武器项目时+100% [ICON_Production] 生产力。本城生产所有军事单位时+50% [ICON_Production] 生产力，生产空中单位和末日机甲时额外50% [ICON_Production] 生产力。

30% [ICON_Production] Production increase to all nuclear armament projects in the city.+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards all millitary units( 50% more bonus when producing Air units and GDRs).

Book of Diverse Crafts
城市在建造奇观时 [ICON_Production] 生产力+20%。此城市建成奇观后获得等同于其生产力10%的大工程师点数。
This city gets +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders. When Wonders being built in this city, grant Great Engineer Points equal to 10% of the cost of the building.

+15% [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production in the city.
此城市可从附近所有拥有区域辐射效果的建筑中获得 [ICON_Food] 食物、 [ICON_Production] 生产力、 [ICON_Gold] 金币、 [ICON_Science] 科技值和 [ICON_Culture] 文化值，而不仅是从相同类型的建筑中首个建成的建筑处获得。
This city receives yields from all nearby district buildings with regional bonuses, not just from the first building of the same type.

本城已改良地块+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
环境效应无法对此城市的改良设施、建筑与区域造成伤害。本城所有专业化区域的相邻产出+150%。
本城所有改良设施和国家公园+200% [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。

9个单元格内其他文明的城市每回合将失去5点忠诚度。 向所有已相遇的城邦一次性派遣1个 [ICON_Envoy] 使者。
Other cities within 9 tiles and not owned by you lose 5 Loyalty per turn. Immediately send one [ICON_Envoy] Envoy to all City States that already met.
